attributes.long-description:
In the dark and mysterious world of Closure, only what you see exists. Manipulate lights to phase objects in and out of reality in this multiple-award-winning puzzle game. Play as a strange spider-like demon who explores the stories of three human characters through beautiful, eerie environments such as a decrepit factory, a murky forest, an abandoned carnival, and the strange, surreal realm that connects them together.
Featuring:
- Nearly 100 puzzles spanning multiple locations such as a decrepit factory, a murky forest, a creepy carnival, and a surreal overworld.
- Four playable characters, including a factory worker, a young woman, a little girl, and a mysterious spider-like demon who ties their tales together.
- 30 hidden Silver Moths, which even the most keen of players will find challenging to collect.
- A unique hand-painted black and white aesthetic and an award-winning original soundtrack that enhances the amazing atmosphere of this game.
